messages.msgSnippet: Hirotada Tokugawa  wrote:          Yes indeed....Happy Birthday Saitou. :) -M. Wouldn t his birthday technically fall on the 29th of
messages.messageBody:
Hirotada Tokugawa <patriot014@...> wrote: Yes indeed....Happy Birthday Saitou. :)

-M.


Wouldn't his birthday technically fall on the 29th of Jan.? Or at least, this year it would...?

-Bunneh

First, http://www.shinsengumihq.com has a new look for 2006 featuring
the best version of Kondo's pic (there is more than one version)
--------------------------------------
Screencaps for NHK Shinsengumi! Sequel
http://fruitapples.cocolog-nifty.com/applescafe/2005/06/post_381f.html
just updated....
http://www.shinsengumi-exp.jp/
you still want MORE KOJI YAMAMOTO???
[scroll down to the bottom...more pics were added]
http://www.hotweb.or.jp/goryokaku-sai/gallery.html

Hijikata Fanart Since all of Japan is enjoying the sequel....
http://www.h4.dion.ne.jp/~sa-ya/html/utage/hijikata.html
--------------------------------------
MAKOTO FILM DOJO
I can host vids which are under 5 mb on my geocities server and
provide links to the vids on SHQ
I made a very simple slide show for Nakajima Nobori
http://1happyturtle.com/shinsengumi/NAKAJIMA_0001.wmv
there is audio

His paintings were well preserved, very vividly painted and all are
quiet big...there is something about a man who can sit there and paint
dozens of works and keep them all to himself...I WUV HIM XD
--------------------------------------
QUESTIONS WHICH KEEP FANGIRLS AWAKE AT NIGHT FINALLY
ANSWERED...a *fangirl* essay about the most controversial aspects of
Saitou Hajime...a point by point discussion
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/manofshadows.htm
--------------------------------------
Early 20th century both Mr and Mrs Fujita are OLD....

Futaba (Tokio's friend) "Pssst Tokio the surprisu is ready you need to
get him out of the office"

Tokio ::clears throat:: and stands in front of Goro's desk "oh look it
is raining outside, and those rickshaws are all unorganized, our girls
will be late for class"

Goro ::mumbling:: "wait, must list families who are late with their
tuition---those Siamese students are so slow in paying"

Tokio ::hands him umbrellas and hat::

Goro finally returns from the downpour and there on his desk a
lopsided cake

Tokio + Futaba "Happy Birthday! Happy Bir--th--day Toooo youuuu"

Goro "you know I can't digest that!"

Tokio ::sob:: "FINE!" ::hollers:: "Girls come eat this!" and students
descend on the cake and finish it in minutes.

Goro "Tokio, it isn't that I don't appreciate it but I'm not a child---"

Tokio ::snarl:: "you sure act like one at your age sometimes"
